00018 EnvIdentifierEditor::EnvIdentifierEditor(View* view, 
00019                                                                                  QWidget *parent, 
00020                                                                                  const QString title): 
00021 QGroupBox(title, parent),
00022 addRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00023 removeRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this),
00024 view_(this), model_(view, this), 
00025 proxy_(this)  {
00026 
00027         //setMinimumHeight(150);
00028 
00029         // set view to be sortable
00030         view_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00031         view_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00032         view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00033         view_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00034         view_.setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00035         //view_.setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00036         view_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00037         view_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::AllEditTriggers);
00038         view_.setWordWrap(true);
00039 
00040         view_.setItemDelegate(new EnvIdentifiersDelegate(this));
00041 
00042         view_.setProperty("mandatoryField", true);
00043 
00044         // set source model for proxy
00045         proxy_.setSourceModel(&model_);
00046         // set proxy to be the source for the view
00047         view_.setModel(&proxy_);
00048 
00049         // sort the view
00050         view_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00051 
00052         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00053         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00054         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00055         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00056 
00057         // create the layout, add widgets to it
00058         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00059         layout->addWidget(&view_);
00060         layout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00061 
00062         restoreChanges();
00063 
00064         connect(&addRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00065                 &model_, SLOT(onAddRow()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00066         connect(&removeRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00067                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00068 
00069         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00070                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00071         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00072                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00073         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00074                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00075         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00076                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00077 }

00080 }

00082 void EnvIdentifierEditor::restoreChanges() {
00083         model_.restore();
00084 }
00085 
00086 void EnvIdentifierEditor::applyChanges() {
00087         model_.apply();
00088 }
00089 
00090 bool EnvIdentifierEditor::isValid() const {
00091         return model_.isValid();
00092 }

00094 void EnvIdentifierEditor::onRemove() {
00095         QModelIndex index = proxy_.mapToSource(view_.currentIndex());
00096 
00097         // if index is valid then remove the row
00098         if (index.isValid())
00099                 model_.onRemoveRow(index.row());
00100 }
